document.full_text: a chilean judge has opened an investigation into the death of the country's revered poet, pablo neruda, responding to allegations that he may have been poisoned just days after the 1973 coup, officials said thursday.
document.title: the americas: chile: inquiry ordered in poet's death
lines_and_colors: a chilean judge has opened an investigation into the death of the country's revered poet, pablo neruda, responding to allegations that he may have been poisoned just days after the 1973 coup, officials said thursday.
